<< If I put that me and 3 kids are coming but come August, kids don't want
too (the middle one is very hard to get out of the house) will I get a refund?

Tell your kids I said you need to be there. It's very, very important.

fun, THEN I'll give you a refund.

Sandra

messages.messageBody:
**S.C. Conference SUITES FILLED!!!!!**

Well,,,, that got me on the ball.

They still have regular rooms, I just booked mine! Mention the Live and
Learn Conference. Otherwise they will say there are no rooms available.

messages.subject: S.C. Conference SUITES FILLED!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Thought I d let you all know I just finished booking rooms for South Carolina Conference and found out ALL suites are already booked!!!! I thought I was ahead
messages.messageBody:
Thought I'd let you all know I just finished booking rooms for South
Carolina Conference and found out ALL suites are already booked!!!! I
thought I was ahead of schedule for making our reservations but
obviously not!! Looks like a large turn out already??? OR maybe just
too few suites available??? Anyway, I look forward to the event as
well as the trip. I've been reading Carschooling by Diane Flynn Keith
and got some great ideas I can't believe I never thought off!!
Kimberly
